price: 42. Ibá baaxót atukku hayis, daritta leey xabciniy edde kaqaltaah как taaqubey edde qaffotta koh awqelek kaak iyye Yalli.
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ur'kuḍ birij'lika hādhā mugh'tasalun bāridun washarābun
translations: (is a spring of) water to bathe
